title: Instalock Mode
body:
Alright, here's an idea for the next featured game mode: Instalock. It is the blindest of blind picks. Here's how champ select works.

1. You pick your champion, having no visibility of what the rest of your team or the enemy team has picked.
2. You and your allies can see each other's picks and have 1 minute to figure out your roles before the game starts.
